skills.desc:
Increases the duration of all [Poison] debuffs and [HP Burn] debuffs on all enemies by 1 turn. Then, instantly activates any [Poison] debuffs and [HP Burn] debuffs on each enemy. 

Places a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns on enemies not under [Poison] debuffs or [HP Burn] debuffs.
